item.title: The darkness will increase, but also the light.
item.description: The darkness will increase, but also the light. “Arise, shine, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord has risen upon you. For the darkness shall cover the earth and deep darkness the peoples; but the Lord shall rise upon you, and His glory shall be seen upon you.” ‭‭Isaiah‬ ‭60:1-2‬ ‭MEV‬‬ A lot of positive prophecies went out for 2020 and a few negative things were also prophesied.

item.title: The Right Hand
item.description: I feel more tingling of the Holy Spirit (presence) in my right hand than in my left hand. Later I heard somebody talk about Satan that came to people’s left side and brought demonic interference - I also know that Jesus is seated at the right side of the Father. I felt God wanted me to explore this. “and He raised us up and seated us together in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus,” ‭‭Ephesians‬ ‭2:6‬ ‭MEV‬‬

item.title: Jesus
item.description: JESUS “And she will bring forth a Son, and you shall call His name JESUS, for He will save His people from their sins.”” ‭‭Matthew‬ ‭1:21‬ ‭NKJV‬‬ He is also called: Yeshua The Hebrew and Aramaic name for Jesus. The Lamb of God “The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said, “Look, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world.

item.title: Submit to God, but at the same time take authority
item.description: Submit to God, but at the same time take authority. We were made to rule. “Then God said, “Let us make mankind in our image, in our likeness, so that they may rule over the fish in the sea and the birds in the sky, over the livestock and all the wild animals, and over all the creatures that move along the ground.” God blessed them and said to them, “Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Do you want to meet Jesus? Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
